title: Korea’s 4 favorite ‘Grandpas’ return
text: Four grandpas - Lee Soon-jae, Shin Goo, Park Geun-hyeong and Baek Il-sub. Provided by CJ E&M Their usual luggage carrier Lee Seo-jin took off to Greece, their fourth overseas trip, joined by Korean Wave pioneer Choi Ji-woo in the latest edition of producer Na Young-seok’s variety show “Grandpas Over Flowers.” Provided by CJ E&M   Bang Shin-sil takes the crown at Dongbu Construction Koreit Championship Seoul to add over 2,500 public trash bins by 2025 Secondhand selling boom fuels convenience store delivery services Stocks open lower as earnings season approaches The price of words is not cheap To write comments, please log in to one of the accounts.
